name: ITER0 Change Order
desc: Create a project, send a quote request to subcontractor, sign the agreement around your approved quotes

quotes.QuoteComments: We increase the discount if you double the order

PROCESSTYPE.name: Change order
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL"><message name="injectListJSON" id="injectListJSON"/><process isExecutable="true" name="Change order" id="Change_order"><documentation>%3Cxml%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxhtml%22%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22start%22%20id%3D%2225%22%20deletable%3D%22false%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EChange%20order%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%2238%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3ECreate%20project%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%2226%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3ESelect%20subcontractors%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%2227%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EVIEW%20-%20Quotes%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3ELIST_RECORDS%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%2228%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3ESelect%20quotes%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%2229%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EVIEW%20-%20Docusign%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3EREAD%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%2230%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3ESign%20contract%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22end%22%20id%3D%2231%22%20deletable%3D%22false%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%2232%22%20x%3D%22338%22%20y%3D%2288%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EDocusign%20Template%20backup%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3EDELETE%3C%2Ffield%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fxml%3E</documentation><startEvent name="Change order" id="start"/><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask11" sourceRef="start" id="flow1"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Createproject_form" name="Create project" id="userTask11"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask11" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage2"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask1" sourceRef="userTask11" id="flow3"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Selectsubcontractors_form" name="Select subcontractors" id="userTask1"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask1" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage4"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask2" sourceRef="userTask1" id="flow5"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="VIEW - Quotes" id="serviceTask2"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_VIEW-Quotes_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${LIST_RECORDSMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask3" sourceRef="serviceTask2" id="flow6"/><userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Selectquotes_form" name="Select quotes" id="userTask3"/><boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask3" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage7"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask4" sourceRef="userTask3" id="flow8"/><serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="VIEW - Docusign" id="serviceTask4"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_VIEW-Docusign_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage10"><messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/></boundaryEvent><sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="userTask5" id="flow11"/>
<serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Docusign Template backup" id="serviceTask6"><extensionElements><activiti:field name="PluginKey"><activiti:string>poi_DocusignTemplatebackup_fact</activiti:string></activiti:field><activiti:field name="parameterMap"><activiti:expression>${DELETEMap}</activiti:expression></activiti:field></extensionElements></serviceTask><endEvent name="end" id="end"/></process></definitions>

PROCESSTYPE.name: Docusign Fact Provider Flow
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
  <process id="io.point.Docusign_provider" name="Docusign Fact Provider Flow" isExecutable="true">
    <startEvent id="startevent1" name="Start"/>
    <serviceTask id="task3" name="Sign" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_Read_Obj_toFields">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objType">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objKey">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow1" sourceRef="startevent1" targetRef="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <endEvent id="endevent1" name="End"/>
    <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway1" name="Exclusive Gateway" default="default"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow14" name="GET" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="task3">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GET"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow17" sourceRef="task3" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="default" name="Unsupported" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <userTask id="usertask1" name="Default" activiti:formKey="poi_default_view"/>
    <serviceTask id="servicetask1" name="OAuth2" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_OAuth_Save">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="username">
          <activiti:expression>${username}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="password">
          <activiti:expression>${password}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow18" name="OAuth" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="servicetask1">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "PUT"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow19" sourceRef="servicetask1" targetRef="endevent1"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_io.point.Docusign_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane bpmnElement="io.point.Docusign_provider" id="BPMNPlane_io.point.Docusign_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="startevent1" id="BPMNShape_startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="70.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="task3" id="BPMNShape_task3">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="30.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="endevent1" id="BPMNShape_endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="740.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1" id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="150.0" y="161.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask1" id="BPMNShape_usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="220.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="servicetask1" id="BPMNShape_servicetask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="100.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow1" id="BPMNEdge_flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="105.0" y="181.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="150.0" y="181.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow14" id="BPMNEdge_flow14">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="161.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="57.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="334.0" y="57.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="13.0" width="23.0" x="179.0" y="41.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow17" id="BPMNEdge_flow17">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="439.0" y="57.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="57.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="default" id="BPMNEdge_default">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="190.0" y="181.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="740.0" y="181.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="13.0" width="63.0" x="209.0" y="164.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow18" id="BPMNEdge_flow18">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="161.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="127.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="334.0" y="127.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="13.0" width="100.0" x="173.0" y="115.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow19" id="BPMNEdge_flow19">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="439.0" y="127.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="127.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>

PROCESSTYPE.name: Stub Fact Provider Flow
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
  <process id="io.point.stub_provider" name="Stub Fact Provider Flow" isExecutable="true">
    <startEvent id="startevent1" name="Start"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow1" sourceRef="startevent1" targetRef="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <endEvent id="endevent1" name="End"/>
    <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway1" name="Exclusive Gateway" default="default"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="default" name="Unsupported" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <userTask id="usertask1" name="Default" activiti:formKey="poi_default_view"/>
    <userTask id="usertask2" name="Type 1" activiti:formKey="poi_type1_view"/>
    <userTask id="usertask3" name="Type 2" activiti:formKey="poi_type2_view"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_io.point.Docusign_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane bpmnElement="io.point.Docusign_provider" id="BPMNPlane_io.point.Docusign_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="startevent1" id="BPMNShape_startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="70.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="endevent1" id="BPMNShape_endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="740.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1" id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="150.0" y="161.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask1" id="BPMNShape_usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="220.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask2" id="BPMNShape_usertask2">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="290.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask3" id="BPMNShape_usertask3">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="360.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow1" id="BPMNEdge_flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="105.0" y="181.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="150.0" y="181.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="default" id="BPMNEdge_default">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="190.0" y="181.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="740.0" y="181.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="12.0" width="63.0" x="209.0" y="164.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>

</definitions>
